Welcome

You’ve arrived at the project website for the Brock University Archives Unleashed Project team, titled “Crisis Communication in the Niagara Region during the COVID-19 Pandemic.” This project is supported by Archives Unleashed Project.

Click on “About” to learn more about the project and the team behind it, and scroll below to read blog posts from our team members reflecting on our work and progress throughout the granting period (2021-2022).

Contact us with any inquiries.
